input.sentences: on our way to a historical re-enactment | we saw some beautiful purple flowers .
there were also pink flowers in an adjacent garden .
couples were lounging in the field | lazing the day away .
we stopped to take a photograph of an ironwork globe .
in the center of the park | a group of re-enactors passed by | dressed in historical attire .
output.sentences: There are beautiful purple flowers throughout the local historical park.
In the center of the park is a garden with bright pink flowers.
This park is perfect for lounging around in the field with friends.
I recommend taking a photograph of where I stopped by the ironwork art piece.
There are many different kinds of people who have passed by this historical park.
